parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the system to get. This ID must be in the user's namespace. The ID should be in the following format. urn:tdm:REGION/ACCOUNT ID/default:system:SYSTEMNAME.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: An object that contains summary data about the system.

nested_items.name: revisionNumber
nested_items.description: The revision number of the system.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the system was created.

nested_items.name: definition
nested_items.description: The definition document of a system.

nested_items.name: language
nested_items.description: The language used to define the entity. GRAPHQL is the only valid value.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The GraphQL text that defines the entity.

nested_items.name: validatedNamespaceVersion
nested_items.description: The namespace version against which the system was validated. Use this value in your system instance.
